channel.title: Mass spawning npcs code for delta. :S
channel.description: ive used the serach bar for "mass spawn npc's" nothing about delta coding came up only pi and who knows or has a link to the code please send me it or post on here thanks :) detla 317 :)

item.title: Mass spawning npcs code for delta. :S
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

if (command.startsWith("linenpc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("james")){ try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); for(int i == 1; i < 9; i++) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX+i, absY, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX-i, absY, heightLevel); } sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } }

This may work

This is how it looks:

()()()()()()()()(-)()()()()()()()()

() = NPC
(-) = You with NPC standing in same space

Read full topic

item.title: Mass spawning npcs code for delta. :S
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“npc”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“james”)) {
try
{
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
if (newNPC >= 0)
{
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel);
sM(“You spawn an npc”);
} else {
sM(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
+ " players online!”);

	}[/code]

and i mean so it spawn just say a man 17 times all in a line i think an old command was like ::hell or sumthing.

and thank for helping me
